frontmatter.title: Large scale simulations
frontmatter.description: Implementation of large scale simulations on Spark

internal.content: --- title: Large scale simulations description: Implementation of large scale simulations on Spark --- One of the exciting part of using ODM in conjunction with CP4D is the ability ofeasily run large scale simulation of decision services by running them on a Spark grid. This chapter presents the basis for this approach and takes you through the actual implementation. ## Embedding decision service execution ## Jupyter notebook ## CP4D function Updated 11/19/2020 - Work in progress
